title: Understanding Resilience
text: Resilience is a key concept in mental health, often associated with how individuals handle stress and adversity.

title: Characteristics of Resilience
text: Think about how people recover from difficult situations. What qualities help them bounce back?

hintAnswer: individual’s ability to bounce back from adversity, trauma, or significant stress
title: Defining Resilience
text: Resilience is often defined as an individual's ability to bounce back from adversity, trauma, or significant stress. Which option best describes this ability?
choices: individual’s ability to bounce back from adversity, trauma, or significant stress
patterns of negative thinking often associated with higher anxiety levels
monitoring and controlling physiological responses to improve physical and mental health
